full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement for Janitorial Services
## Solicitation No.: 30003157
### Project Title: Janitorial Services at DFO St Lewis Office

The Government of Canada invites tenders for the provision of janitorial services at the Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) St. Lewis office. The requirement is for a supplier who can provide all necessary janitorial services, including cleaning of common areas, offices, and workstations.

### Contract Details
* **Contract Period:** February 2023 to December 2023, with three one-year option periods
* **Trade Agreements:** Subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* **Solicitation Method:** Competitive bidding, open to suppliers who can meet the required standards and qualifications

### Technical Specifications
* The supplier must provide cleaning services to all specified areas, including but not limited to:
	+ Offices and workstations
	+ Washrooms with sink and toilet
	+ Entrances, lobbies, vestibules, corridors, and storage spaces
	+ Kitchen/lunchroom facilities with refrigerator, stove, microwave, and sink
	+ Shower/change rooms with janitor's closet
* Cleaning services must be provided three times per week, preferably on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays, but subject to variation

### Security Requirements
* The contract includes security requirements, which must be met by the supplier

### Tender Information
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 17, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* **Tender Documents:** Available on Buyandsell.gc.ca
* **Contact Information:** Martin Larocque, Procurement Hub, Fisheries and Oceans Canada, 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0E6, Canada
* **Email:** [Martin.Larocque@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:Martin.Larocque@dfo-mpo.gc.ca), [DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)

### Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)
This notice is issued in both English and French. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with
